  • 4.II.13F

    #Analysis II
    2006

    State precisely the contraction mapping theorem.

    An ancient way to approximate the square root of a positive number aaa is to start with a guess x>0x>0x>0 and then hope that the average of xxx and a/xa / xa/x gives a better guess.     #Statistics
    2006
